item.title: Mortal Kombat 2 Star Teases Kano's Return From The Dead: "Prepare Yourselves For A Kano 2.0"
item.description: Mortal Kombat 2 star Josh Lawson teases Kano's resurrection in the upcoming sequel, hinting the hero-turned-villain will be a changed man.

item.title: 10 Great Marvel Stories Sony's Spider-Man Universe Movies Wasted
item.description: Sony’s Spider-Man Universe set up a swathe of narratives that will now never be full realised, leaving numerous tantalizing teases throughout.

item.title: 10 Sci-Fi Movies That Succeeded Regardless Of Being Derivative
item.description: The fact that a story isn’t exactly original doesn’t mean it can’t be great, or that it doesn’t have anything to add to the larger sci-fi scene.
